unnormalised: Electoral reforms in India, especially regarding campaign finance, are crucial. Think stricter enforcement of the Model Code of Conduct, perhaps around festivals like Onam, when spending often increases. We need better transparency in political donations. The Election Commission of India (ECI) could explore digital voting more actively. Consider also linking Aadhaar to voter ID to curb bogus voting, a persistent challenge from Kashmir to Kanyakumari. These reforms impact governance significantly.
